title: Twitch Search
description: A web application that uses Twitch API that allows users to search for their favorite streamers, watch the stream and interact in the chat. (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js)

title: Chat App
description: A software application that functions as a chat app. The server allows multiple clients to connect through multithreading, it stores a log of the chat and displays what was said in the server to a new client that joins. (C++)

title: ArtXperience
description: An art community platform where users can browse and post artworks, post comments, and journals. Admins on can manage users and posts. (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js)

title: Friends List
description: A web application that represents a friend list where users can invite friends to play games and admins can manager users and games. (MongoDB, Express, Angular, Node.js)
